set.name: DMR-16真 Super Battle Guynext x Shin

card.name: Heart Burn, Battle General Galaxy Fortress

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your Dragons in the battle zone gets 'speed attacker'. Dragsolution—When one of your Dragons untaps, flip this to the Dragheart creature side and untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets 'speed attacker'. Triple breaker Dragon Evade

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your creatures is destroyed, you may add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. Dragsolution: At the end of your turn, if your number of shields is greater than your opponent, flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your Dragons attack, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. That creature doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn. Triple breaker True Escape (When this creature would leave the battle zone, you may add 2 of your shields to your hand instead. You can't use the 'shield trigger' abilities of those shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} Double breaker Each of your light creatures gets 'Saver: Angel Command'. (When one of your Angel Commands would be destroyed, you may destroy one of your creatures that has 'Saver: Angel Command' instead.) Mana Arms 7: If you have 7 or more light cards in your mana zone, each of your light creatures put into your hand from your shields gets 'shield trigger'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker Whenever you cast a spell, you may draw a card. Each of your spells gets 'Strike Back: Same Civilization'. (Whenever a shield is put into your hand, you may discard it. If you do, cast a spell that has the same civilization as that shield from your hand for no cost.)

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you may cast a spell that has 'Spark' in its name from your hand for no cost. While your opponent has no untapped creatures, this creature gets +5500 power and 'double breaker'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your fire creatures. Double breaker Whenever this creature attacks, after the attack, you may tap one of your other fire creatures. If you do, untap this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your opponent's creatures that have power 4000 or less can't attack. Dragsolution: At the start of your turn, if the total cost of your creatures in the battle zone is 25 or more, flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Quattro breaker If you have no shields, your opponent's creatures that have less power than this creature can't attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your light creatures. Double breaker Escape (When this creature would be destroyed, you may add a card from your shield zone to your hand instead. You can't use the 'shield trigger' ability of that shield.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 5: When this creature is put into your hand from your shields, if you have 5 or more light cards in your mana zone, this creature gets {SHIELD TRIGGER}. When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's non-evolution cards that costs 5 or less in the battle zone and add it to its owner's shields face down. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a dragheart that costs 3 or less or a light dragheart that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (If it's a weapon, equip it to this creature.) Mana Arms 5: If you have 5 or more light cards in your mana zone, each of your Light creatures in the battle zone gets 'shield saver'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 5: When this creature is put into your hand from your shields, if you have 5 or more water cards in your mana zone, this creature gets {SHIELD TRIGGER}. When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's non-evolution cards that costs 5 or less in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this fortress into the battle zone, you may draw a card. Hyperspatial Dragheart Fortress

alternate.name: All Over The World, Supreme True Dragon Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is dragsolutioned, each player puts all cards in his hand, battle zone and graveyard other than this creature into their owners decks and shuffles it. Speed attacker World breaker When this creature would leave the battle zone, if it's tapped, it stays in the battle zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cast a spell that costs 7 or less from your graveyard for no cost. After you cast that spell, put it on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 5: When this creature is put into your hand from your shields, if you have 5 or more darkness cards in your mana zone, this creature gets {SHIELD TRIGGER}. When you put this creature into the battle zone, each of your opponent's creatures gets -2000 power. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.) Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this fortress into the battle zone, your opponent chooses and discards a card from his hand. Hyperspatial Dragheart Fortress

alternate.name: All Over The World, Supreme True Dragon Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is dragsolutioned, each player puts all cards in his hand, battle zone and graveyard other than this creature into their owners decks and shuffles it. Speed attacker World breaker When this creature would leave the battle zone, if it's tapped, it stays in the battle zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put up to 2 fortresses that cost 3 or less or a Fire dragheart that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. Speed attacker Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 5: When this creature is put into your hand from your shields, if you have 5 or more fire cards in your mana zone, this creature gets {SHIELD TRIGGER}. When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's non-evolution cards that costs 5 or less in the battle zone and put it into its owner's graveyard. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gravity Zero-If you have 3 or more Dragons in the battle zone, you may cast this spell for no cost. Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets +3000 power and breaks an additional shield until the end of the turn. Whenever one of your creatures is blocked this turn, untap that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your nature creatures. Double breaker Whenever this creature attacks, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 5: When this creature is put into your hand from your shields, if you have 5 or more nature cards in your mana zone, this creature gets {SHIELD TRIGGER}. When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's non-evolution cards in the battle zone that costs 5 or less and put it into it's owner mana zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker Escape (When this creature would be destroyed, you may add a card from your shield zone to your hand instead. You can't use the 'shield trigger' ability of that shield.)

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Add a card from your hand to your shields face down. If you have more shields than your opponent, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your water creatures. This creature can't be blocked. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature would be discarded from your hand by the ability of one of your opponent's creatures or spells, you may put it into the battle zone instead. When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all creatures that have no abilities from the revealed cards into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may add a card from your hand to your shields face down. If you do, choose one of your shields and put it into your hand. You can't use the 'shield trigger' ability of that shield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Strike Back — Darkness (When a darkness card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may discard that card. If you do, summon this creature for no cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your creatures. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Strike Back—Fire (When a fire card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may discard that card. If you do, summon this creature for no cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets +3000 power and the Gaial Command Dragon race until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Guardman When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a dragheart that costs 3 or less or a nature dragheart that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (If it's a weapon, equip it to this creature.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Saver: Light creature (When one of your light creatures would be destroyed, you may destroy this creature instead.) Mana Arms 3: When this creature is destroyed, if you have 3 or more light cards in your mana zone, put the top card of your deck into your shield zone face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} You may have 4 or more 'Newee, Guerrilla Division ' in your deck. If you don't have 5 or more creatures in the battle zone, this creature can't attack players. If you have 5 or more creatures that have 'Guerrilla Division' in their name in the battle zone, this creature gets +5000 power and 'double breaker'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature can't be blocked. Escape (When this creature would be destroyed, you may add a card from your shield zone to your hand instead. You can't use the 'shield trigger' ability of that shield.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have 4 or more 'Aquaarmy, Guerrilla Division ' in your deck. If you have 5 or more creatures that have 'Guerrilla Division' in their name in the battle zone, this creature gets +5000 power and 'double breaker'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand. If you have more shields than your opponent, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Draw up to 2 cards. Then discard a card from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Slayer Escape (When this creature would be destroyed, you may add a card from your shield zone to your hand instead. You can't use the 'shield trigger' ability of that shield.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return a creature from your graveyard to your hand. If you have more shields than your opponent, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker Escape (When this creature would be destroyed, you may add a card from your shield zone to your hand instead. You can't use the 'shield trigger' ability of that shield.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 3: If you have 3 or more fire cards in your mana zone, your Command Dragons may each cost up to 2 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: One of your creatures in the battle zone gets 'speed attacker'. (A creature that gets 'speed attacker' doesn't get summoning sickness.) If you have more shields than your opponent, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one of your creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets +3000 power and breaks an additional shield until the end of the turn. If you have more shields than your opponent, you may draw a card.
